about-me:
An attentive and passionate Java/Kotlin back-end Software Engineer from Turkey with 3 years of professional work experience. I'm mainly focused on developing cloud serverless, highly scalable, containerized back-end applications with Spring, Micronaut, Quarkus and VertX technologies.

Moreover, I have developing experience in cloud with AWS and databases with DynamoDB, MariaDB, MySQL and SQLite.

During my professional experience, I contributed in development of websites, Android applications which are used by millions and in multi-national distributed projects.

I'm passionate about learning new technologies, helping and sharing my knowledge with my team. Furthermore, I'm developing open-source projects in my free times.

kocaeli-bahcesehir-highschool.title: Private Kocaeli Bahçeşehir Anatolian High School - Turkey

edirne-bahcesehir-highschool.title: Private Edirne Bahçeşehir Anatolian High School - Turkey

iconecwave.title: iConec Wave (Istanbul/Fully Remote)
iconecwave.description: I'm developing web services, fixing bugs and improving the existing codebase in AWS for our famous customer Royal Canin company. From factory packaging till the end-user. By using the AWS SDK mainly Java, DynamoDB, S3 and Spring.

kodgemisi.title: Kod Gemisi (Turkey/Fully Remote)
kodgemisi.description: During my internship, I was improving existing and adding new scenario tests to the project. Besides, I created web services and focused on fixing bugs.

general-mobile.title: General Mobile Inc. (Istanbul/In Office)
general-mobile.description: I created GM Gallery GO Android application. Moreover, I contributed in projects with my 6 other teammates, developing the following applications: GM Music, GM File Manager, GM Assistant and GM Voice Recorder applications which are used by millions and are still available in Google Play.

iconecwave.title: iConec Wave - Royal Canin
iconecwave.things: AWS, Spring, Java, Serverless, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, S3
iconecwave.description: Royal Canin is a famous French cat & dog food producer. I'm contributing to development of web services solutions for distribution, veterinary clinic and customer order managements in US, France and Japan continents.

iconecwave-dxpathfinder.title: iConec Wave - DxPathFinder
iconecwave-dxpathfinder.description: DxPathFinder is an online digital performance cockpit. I provide web service solutions for project needs also with helping improving business calculations.

kodgemisi.title: Kod Gemisi - Grispi >> https://grispi.com
kodgemisi.things: Kotlin, Java, Micronaut, Hibernate, Docker, PostgreSQL, Hexagonal Architecture
kodgemisi.description: Grispi is a CRM application like Zendesk. I improved and added new scenario tests, optimized code base, and developed web services for groups and tickets in application.

general-mobile.title: General Mobile - Android Applications
general-mobile.things: Kotlin, Java, Dagger, Retrofit, Picasso, MVVM, MVP, MVC
general-mobile.description: I developed Android applications which are still available and were used by millions in Google Play. The applications I contributed in development of new futures and bug fixes were GM Gallery GO, GM Music, GM File Manager, GM Voice Recorder and GM Assistant.

portfolio.title: Portfolio >> https://duruer.dev
portfolio.description: My small open-source serverless portfolio website which I have created to introduce myself. It supports both Turkish and English languages. I built with SvelteKit, Netlify, Bootstrap 4 and SvelteKit.

routve.title: Routve
routve.description: An open-source advanced Svelte 3 router library which is based on Page.js library, which supports dynamic and static component import.

pano.title: Pano
pano.description: An open-source advanced gaming CMS for Minecraft community server website needs. It supports themes, addons and more features. I built with Kotlin, SvelteKit and previously Vue.

antik-kup.title: Antik Küp
antik-kup.description: A Minecraft MMORPG game. We have created an unique game in Minecraft for players.
